title: Wayne's World
content:
Hi,

I need to recreate the waynes world top 10 babe list and i am in need of the font for the title and the list names. can yall guide me in the right direction please? thank you.

Eric
author: ericrey

comments.content: And when you, please rate Betty Rubble in the 5 slot - thx:)

The one at the top is [Dynamo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072717/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/dynamo/). The other one seems to be [Alternate Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072717/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/alternate-gothic/) or [Trade Gothic Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150315072717/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/trade-gothic/). Also, it seems to be black type with a red shadow, but that may just be a video artifact.
